# Interactive graph

<html>
<head>
    <title>Rat Sightings in NYC</title>
    <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/d3@7"></script>
    <style>
        .chart {
            width: 960px;
            height: 500px;
        }
        .tooltip {
            position: absolute;
            text-align: center;
            width: auto;
            height: auto;
            padding: 8px;
            font: 12px sans-serif;
            background: lightsteelblue;
            border: 0px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            pointer-events: none;
            opacity: 0;
            transition: opacity 0.3s;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <div>
        <label for="borough-select">Choose a borough:</label>
        <select id="borough-select">
            <option value="all">All Boroughs</option>
            <!-- Options for boroughs will be added here -->
        </select>
        <label for="building-type-select">Choose a building type:</label>
        <select id="building-type-select">
            <option value="all">All Building Types</option>
            <!-- Options for building types will be added here -->
        </select>
    </div>
    <svg class="chart"></svg>
    <div class="tooltip"></div>
    <script src="scripts/myscript.js"></script>
</body>
</html>
